rules.natural: Provided that the control hub is powered, the home automation system becomes functional.
If energy saver is active, then the entertainment system is not running.
Whenever security manual override is activated, the security protocol is bypassed.
If security manual override is activated, then emergency mode is initiated.
Under the condition that emergency mode is initiated, backup power is activated.
Whenever backup power is activated, safety systems are engaged.
If a system check is scheduled, then, should the home automation not be functional, the gaming console is not operational.
Either a system check is scheduled or a diagnostic test is performed.
Whenever system integrity is verified, then, if a diagnostic test is performed, it follows that, should the home automation not be functional, the gaming console is not operational.
Under the condition that component health is confirmed, then, provided a diagnostic test is performed, if the home automation is not functional, the gaming console is not operational.
If a system scan is completed, then system integrity is verified.
A system scan is completed or a health check is finished.
Provided that a health check is finished, component health is confirmed.
If the entertainment device is disabled, then the gaming console is not operational.
Whenever the gaming unit is deactivated, the entertainment device is disabled.
Either security mode is enabled or the lighting system is not activated.
Under the condition that the motion sensor is triggered, emergency lighting is activated.
The motion sensor is triggered or the temperature sensor is triggered.
If the temperature sensor is triggered, then security mode is not enabled.
Provided that movement is detected, then, if emergency lighting is activated, security mode is not enabled.
Either movement is detected or a temperature change is detected.
Under the condition that a temperature change is detected, then, should emergency lighting be activated, security mode is not enabled.
The entertainment system is running or the home automation is functional.
If it is not the case that power management being enabled implies energy saver is active, then a fault is detected in the system.
Provided that it is not the case that safety systems being engaged implies the security protocol is not bypassed, then an error is detected in safety.
Under the condition that it is not the case that safety systems being engaged implies the security protocol is not bypassed, then it is not the case that an error is detected in safety.
If the control hub is not powered, then the lighting system is activated.
Whenever the home automation is not functional, security manual override is activated.
Provided that the home automation is not functional, the gaming console is operational.
If the home automation is not functional, then the gaming unit is deactivated.

facts.natural: It is not the case that a fault is detected in the system.

steps.natural: Whenever emergency lighting is activated, security mode is not enabled.
Provided that the motion sensor is triggered, security mode is not enabled.
Security mode is not enabled.
The lighting system is not activated.
The control hub is powered.
The home automation is functional.
Under the condition that power management is enabled, energy saver is active.
Energy saver is active.
The entertainment system is not running.
The home automation is functional.
Under the condition that safety systems are engaged, the security protocol is not bypassed.
Provided that backup power is activated, it is not the case that the security protocol is bypassed.
If emergency mode is initiated, then the security protocol is not bypassed.
Provided that security manual override is activated, it is not the case that the security protocol is bypassed.
Security manual override is not activated.
The home automation is functional.
Either system integrity is verified or component health is confirmed.
Provided that a diagnostic test is performed, then, if the home automation is not functional, the gaming console is not operational.
Provided that the home automation is not functional, the gaming console is not operational.
The home automation is functional.
Under the condition that the home automation is not functional, the entertainment device is disabled.
Provided that the home automation is not functional, the gaming console is not operational.
The home automation is functional.

natural_facts.A12: A fault is detected in the system.
natural_facts.A18: An error is detected in safety.

(A1 → G).natural: Provided that the control hub is powered, the home automation system becomes functional.

(A10 → ¬A9).natural: If energy saver is active, then the entertainment system is not running.

(A11 → A10).natural: Under the condition that power management is enabled, energy saver is active.

(A13 → A14).natural: Whenever security manual override is activated, the security protocol is bypassed.

(A13 → A15).natural: If security manual override is activated, then emergency mode is initiated.

(A13 → ¬A14).natural: Provided that security manual override is activated, it is not the case that the security protocol is bypassed.

(A15 → A16).natural: Under the condition that emergency mode is initiated, backup power is activated.

(A15 → ¬A14).natural: If emergency mode is initiated, then the security protocol is not bypassed.

(A16 → A17).natural: Whenever backup power is activated, safety systems are engaged.

(A16 → ¬A14).natural: Provided that backup power is activated, it is not the case that the security protocol is bypassed.

(A17 → ¬A14).natural: Under the condition that safety systems are engaged, the security protocol is not bypassed.

(A20 → (¬G → ¬A19)).natural: If a system check is scheduled, then, should the home automation not be functional, the gaming console is not operational.

(A20 ∨ A21).natural: Either a system check is scheduled or a diagnostic test is performed.

(A21 → (¬G → ¬A19)).natural: Provided that a diagnostic test is performed, then, if the home automation is not functional, the gaming console is not operational.

(A22 → (A21 → (¬G → ¬A19))).natural: Whenever system integrity is verified, then, if a diagnostic test is performed, it follows that, should the home automation not be functional, the gaming console is not operational.

(A22 ∨ A23).natural: Either system integrity is verified or component health is confirmed.

(A23 → (A21 → (¬G → ¬A19))).natural: Under the condition that component health is confirmed, then, provided a diagnostic test is performed, if the home automation is not functional, the gaming console is not operational.

(A24 → A22).natural: If a system scan is completed, then system integrity is verified.

(A24 ∨ A25).natural: A system scan is completed or a health check is finished.

(A25 → A23).natural: Provided that a health check is finished, component health is confirmed.

(A26 → ¬A19).natural: If the entertainment device is disabled, then the gaming console is not operational.

(A27 → A26).natural: Whenever the gaming unit is deactivated, the entertainment device is disabled.

(A3 ∨ ¬A2).natural: Either security mode is enabled or the lighting system is not activated.

(A4 → A6).natural: Under the condition that the motion sensor is triggered, emergency lighting is activated.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: Provided that the motion sensor is triggered, security mode is not enabled.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: The motion sensor is triggered or the temperature sensor is triggered.

(A5 → ¬A3).natural: If the temperature sensor is triggered, then security mode is not enabled.

(A6 → ¬A3).natural: Whenever emergency lighting is activated, security mode is not enabled.

(A7 → (A6 → ¬A3)).natural: Provided that movement is detected, then, if emergency lighting is activated, security mode is not enabled.

(A7 ∨ A8).natural: Either movement is detected or a temperature change is detected.

(A8 → (A6 → ¬A3)).natural: Under the condition that a temperature change is detected, then, should emergency lighting be activated, security mode is not enabled.

(A9 ∨ G).natural: The entertainment system is running or the home automation is functional.

(¬(A11 → A10) → A12).natural: If it is not the case that power management being enabled implies energy saver is active, then a fault is detected in the system.

(¬(A17 → ¬A14) → A18).natural: Provided that it is not the case that safety systems being engaged implies the security protocol is not bypassed, then an error is detected in safety.

(¬(A17 → ¬A14) → ¬A18).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that safety systems being engaged implies the security protocol is not bypassed, then it is not the case that an error is detected in safety.

(¬A1 → A2).natural: If the control hub is not powered, then the lighting system is activated.

(¬G → A13).natural: Whenever the home automation is not functional, security manual override is activated.

(¬G → A19).natural: Provided that the home automation is not functional, the gaming console is operational.

(¬G → A26).natural: Under the condition that the home automation is not functional, the entertainment device is disabled.

(¬G → A27).natural: If the home automation is not functional, then the gaming unit is deactivated.

(¬G → ¬A19).natural: Provided that the home automation is not functional, the gaming console is not operational.

¬A12.natural: It is not the case that a fault is detected in the system.

¬A13.natural: Security manual override is not activated.

¬A2.natural: The lighting system is not activated.

¬A9.natural: The entertainment system is not running.
